website_summaries.verdict: Set of 3 Nordic-inspired hand-knit stockings with reindeer and snowflake designs are 26 inches long for major stuffing.
pros: The knit stretches really well (up to 3 feet) yet retains its shape and returns to its normal size after
The knit doesn't snag on the items being stuffed
cons: There's no cuff on the top for adding your own name
Cats have been known to climb in

customer_reviews.title: Cute stockings. Picture is not what I received
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute stockings. I’m pretty bummed because two of the stockings are the same and the picture they are all different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft, long!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, can't wait to use them this Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Stocking
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are BEAUTIFUL. My husband has always wanted large, Nordic-style stockings to hang up for Christmas, so I decided to give these a try. They are very large and very good quality. They are gorgeous both in color and pattern. My husband was so excited when he saw these. We overstuffed them with candy and gifts on Christmas Eve, and they didn't snag on anything that we put inside, or even on my wedding ring when I was stuffing things down to the bottom. After we took the gifts and candy out, they went back to normal size and shape. I'm sure we'll have these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: MeleriHaf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nisses to decorate your home for children
customer_reviews.text: I truly love how they looks in my livingroom. We adopted 3 little nisses from Denmark and their Christmas culture. Every years they would decorate our home with Danish Christmas decoration. Last Christmas I realized I need to add little more Danish touch in our home. It was perfect to hang on my china hutch!
customer_reviews.author: KU AZ family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wanted stockings that have a little give to them. These can stretch really far out for those bigger items. Then go back to original size. Although, I did happen to load & give the stocking on same night. May not stretch back if loaded up longer. Nice knitting. Wonderful quality. I would have expected to pay much more for the set of 4 considering how well they are made
customer_reviews.author: lisa doss

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas stocking. You can fit so much stuff in them.
customer_reviews.text: I love the material it’s not like the cheap “foamy” ones you get at most local places. It looks and feels like someone’s grandmother made it by hand. Once full they can end up being almost 3ft long. We have a young Siamese cat that’s maybe 5-6lbs, we put him in one of the stockings as a joke(with his head sticking out of course) and he decided it was a great place to take a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Chace H.

customer_reviews.title: Long and narrow, but otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are very long, but they're good quality and look very nice. While they're probably more decorative since they're a little narrow, you could still fit some smaller stocking stuffers in there. The designs are adorable, not your typical cheap and cheesy Christmas designs. The fabric is soft and feels like it'll last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Huge Stockings Hang Strong Under Heavy Weight
customer_reviews.text: These are huge stockings! Even given the dimensions I was surprised by how big they are, and I was not disappointed. We loaded them up a couple days before Christmas and even through they sagged a little under the weight of all the goodies inside they never failed! The patterns were all unique, despite some reviews saying they received duplicates, and even they are a little basic the quality of the stockings more than makes up for that. Can’t wait to break these out next year and load them up again!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Stockings
customer_reviews.text: I loved how big these were. I loved that there were no strings that fought the stuff in the stocking. This was the first year I didn’t struggle putting stuff in the stockings for the kids. I should have looked for these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knit socks
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasn't expecting much, but these socks are VERY nice. Great quality and look great. The length is perfect, I just wish they were a bit wider. Great socks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Sowden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: Love these Christmas stockings, good quality, nice size, stretchy and just right for "stuffing", not to mention the beautiful Nordic designs. They look fantastic hung by the chimney with care. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cute stockings
customer_reviews.text: Longer than I thought they’d be but that’s not a bad thing
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Evans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stockings!
customer_reviews.text: These stocking are WELL WORTH THE MONEY. They are over 24 inches long, very very sturdy (you know to really cram things in there) These are so we'll made that I'm going to embroider my kids names in the top and i don't think I'll have to buy them again for a long long time. They remind me of the one I had growing up that my grandmother know for me. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: james rigdon

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy! I love them! Very well made and large enough to stuff with goodies. The print matches my rustic log cabin : ) They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love these stockings. They’re large and well made. The material is sooo soft too! They look and feel very expensive! I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stockings
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Stockings. Seem well made and thick. Absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy  Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They’re really pretty. Classic look. Feel like a cozy sweater. Plenty of room to fill with Christmas treasure.
customer_reviews.author: SiriusLeonStable

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stockings!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Nice big stockings and the knit quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Anisor Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made super cute but I don’t know if I would hang them after filling them. But they hang nicely empty!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Guyot

customer_reviews.title: Not red and white
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The description says red and white. They are very very maroon and white. Will be sending them back!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Large stockings
customer_reviews.text: Liked the style and the quality. Surprised at how large they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy E.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about durability - haven't been used yet. Really like them - happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Distler

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stockings. They look beautiful and they’re high quality. Perfect size as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: big stockings, they were perfect for my kids small gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are great quality and fit a lot of gifts. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Chapek

customer_reviews.title: Color is not a true red but maroon
customer_reviews.text: Not a well defined heal but more of a tube.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the size because of the goodies I plan to stuff in them. Already tested them with the new bluetooth speaker and crayola coloring board I bought for my kids. Happy to report that they are definately long and wide enough to fit without stretching the stockings out of shape. The knitting is beautifully done, and I know how to knit FWIW.
customer_reviews.author: Deda Elementi

customer_reviews.title: Huge and NOT disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these.. and I rarely give 5 stars. They are huge and will be perfect for Santa to stuff full of surprises. I ordered two sets and got the 3 varieties in both sets. They are well made and the extra liner inside will help so the knit doesn't get snagged. I would love to see these in different colors as we have 6 in my family and it'd be nice if we could each have a unique stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Ele R

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous stockings
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are absolutely beautiful and seem very well made. I didn’t pay attention to the size when I ordered them and was surprised by how large they are. I had to return them because they were too big for us. It broke my heart because I loved them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I saw reviews about receiving wrong ones but I received what was pictured. These are high quality and my kids love them! Perfect for Christmas and a great value since stockings can get pricey.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all the goodies
customer_reviews.text: We like to do stockings at Christmas, and we tend to go overboard. These were extra large and fit all the goodies as intended. No snags on the stockings and I hope to use these for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Kat BrandauTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Christmas stockings!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! Very large! I wish the "heels" had more of a bend... It sort of hangs in a straight line... But you get the idea that it's a stocking. That's the only reason for a star off... Otherwise, the knitting is done well! And the pattern looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stockings for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find my original stockings from last year so I bought these for Christmas to use them. I LOVE THEM! They are so nice and great quality! I can put some many stocking stuffers in them. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these.
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are great. I can’t belive I paid this price for three. They are really cute and you would pay $25 easily a piece in any store. They are large and that’s excatly ready we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great - large stockings
customer_reviews.text: These are so inexpensive, I wasn't sure what the quality would be. They seem like they will last several years at Christmas. And they are very large. I ordered another set for extended family after these arrived.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not very stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Great decoration but they don’t hold very much so I wouldn’t use them for a stocking to fill
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: We have a huge fireplace so I wanted a stocking that looked proportional, These are absolutely PERFECT and will hold lots of Christmas goodies!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sissom

customer_reviews.title: Bomb Stockings
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best stocking for the money, especially if you want a little Euro chic style in your kitschy Christmas house. Good quality. So much less expensive than a lot of junk out there.
customer_reviews.author: judah

product_meta.title: Starry Dynamo Knit Christmas Stockings 26-Inch Extra Long Hand-Knitted Red/White Big & Little Reindeer Snowflakes Holiday Décor (2-Pack (Reindeer & Snowflakes), Extra Long 26")
product_meta.description:
Color:2-pack (Reindeer & Snowflakes)| Size:Extra Long - 26"

 

About These Stockings by Starry Dynamo:

 *  High-definition stitching exhibits beautifully knit reindeer and snowflakes against a background of intricately set Christmas elements
 *  Red-white Scandinavian inspired shapes add a modern look to a homespun knitted design, matches well with a variety of home mantle decorations
 *  Thick hand-knit yarn and durable loop that lets you hang them anywhere from traditional holders to wall hooks, door knobs, and staircase railings
 *  Machine washable stockings make for a long-lasting piece of Christmas cheer you'll love to hang up year after year
 *  Comes in convenient sets and matching patterns for the whole family, available in 2, 3 or 4 for one affordable price




FAQs:

Can these stockings be personalized?

We cannot personalize the stockings since they are shipped directly from Amazon warehouses for fast delivery. For those who knit, the cuff measures 2.8" in length which is plenty of room to stitch on a name or initials.






How much can you fit into each stocking?

Larger than a typical stocking, each measures 26" long and 6.5" wide (66 x 16.5 cm). They fit all kinds of stuffers including bottled perfume, cosmetics, toy trucks, boxed candies, portable speakers, stuffed animals, books, and more. Don't worry about the weight - the sturdy loops can withstand at least as much weight as your stocking holder or hook.



How do I clean them?

These stockings are made of 100% machine washable material. Air or line dry.
feature_bullets: Measures 26 inches (66 cm) from top of the cuff to the toe, with a 6.5-inch wide stretchable opening across the cuff
Nordic inspired icons adorn a thick (10-ply) hand-knit yarn for a cozy homespun look; makes for a classic yet modern holiday addition atop your fireplace.

Features baby reindeer and snowflakes to complete a set of 2; each uniquely themed pattern mixes a rich variety of fair isle, argyle, and instarsia knitting techniques; high stitch definition showcases every detail from crisp curves of reindeer torso to geometry of snowflakes.

Fully lined to prevent inside items from poking through; slightly stretchable to allow for a variety of stuffer shapes and sizes (fits as large as a boombox); each stocking has a sturdy loop that’s hangable on any hook (e.g. on staircases, walls, doors, etc.) or holder

Crafted from durable acrylic yarn, so you can easily machine wash and hang them up year after year; stockings are yarn-dyed, meaning the fibers have been treated individually with environmentally safe dyes before weaving to offer vibrant, lasting colors;

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
